import React, { Component } from "react"; import Tooltip from "./Tooltip"; import "../Styles/App.css"; class Members extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { select: "All Members", members: this.props.members.map((group, key) => { return (
{group[0].name}
{group[0].jobs}
{group[1].name}
{group[1].jobs}
{group[2].name}
{group[2].jobs}
{group[3].name}
{group[3].jobs}
); }), }; } render() { return
{this.state.members}
; } } export default Members;
